sen.j: 佐久奈度神社（さくなどじんじゃ）は、滋賀県大津市大石中町にある神社である。
sen.e: Sakunado-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine that exists in Oishinaka-cho, Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.
Sakunado-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Oishinaka-cho, Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.
sen.cmt: that existsをlocatedに変更しました。
sen.e: Sakunado-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Oishinaka-cho, Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 祭神は祓戸大神である。
sen.e: The enshrined deity is Haraedo no okami.
The enshrined deity is Haraedo no okami.
The enshrined deity is Haraedo no okami.
It was a prefectural shrine in the old classification of shrines.
It was a prefectural shrine in the old classification of shrines.
It was a prefectural shrine in the old classification of shrines.

sen.cmt: 「心櫻十六菊」の読みは推測です。

sen.j: 天智天皇8年勅願により、中臣金連が祓戸の神を祀ったのが創始である。
sen.e: The shrine was first built with the enshrinement of Haraedo no kami by NAKATOMI no Kanenomuraji at the Imperial order of Emperor Tenchi in 669.
The shrine was first built with the enshrinement of Haraedo no kami by NAKATOMI no Kanenomuraji at the Imperial order of the Emperor Tenchi in 669.
sen.cmt: 宮内庁HPの記載に従い、天智天皇（てんじてんのう）：Emperor Tenjiとしました。
sen.e: The shrine was first built with the enshrinement of Haraedo no kami by NAKATOMI no Kanenomuraji at the Imperial order of the Emperor Tenchi in 669.

sen.j: 以来、七瀬の祓い所の一つとして貞観 (日本)元年には従五位上の神階を賜った。
sen.e: It was given the status of the divine rank of Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade as one of Nanase no haraidokoro in 859.
Since then, It had been given the status of the divine rank of Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade as one of Nanase no haraidokoro in 859.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れを追記し、一部変更しました。
sen.e: Since then, it has been given the status of the divine rank of Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade as one of Nanase no haraidokoro in 859.

sen.j: 式内社名神大社である。
sen.e: It is a Shikinai-sha Myojin-taisha (shrine listed in Engishiki law).
It is a Shikinai-sha Myojin-taisha (shrine listed in Engishiki law).
It is a Shikinai-sha Myojin-taisha (shrine listed in Engishiki law).

sen.j: 明治9年に村社に列格し、大正10年に県社に昇格した。
sen.e: It was given the tile of sonsha (a village shrine) in 1876 and was promoted to prefectural shrine in 1921.
It was given the title of a sonsha (a village shrine) in 1876 and was promoted to a prefectural shrine in 1921.
sen.cmt: スペルミスを修正しました。
sen.e: It was given the title of a sonsha (a village shrine) in 1876 and was promoted to a prefectural shrine in 1921.

sen.cmt: 大文字に変更しました。
「焼鎌神社」の読みは推測です。

「焼鎌」（やきがま）と読むようです。http://books.google.com/books?id=cXj4ki6KxPIC&pg=PA179&dq=%E7%84%BC%E9%8E%8C+%E6%95%8F%E9%8E%8C%E3%80%80%E7%A5%9D%E8%A9%9E+%E3%82%84%E3%81%8D%E3%81%8C%E3%81%BE&hl=ja&ei=7k9iTPLzFYXCcdTmrecJ&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=1&ved=0CCwQ6AEwAA#v=onepage&q&f=false
「敏鎌神社」の読みは推測です。
別ファイルの訳に合わせました。
大文字に変更しました。

sen.e: long lasting good luck in a battle
Long-lasting good luck in a battle
